EmailTemplate.subject: [Registration Confirmed] Airline Operators Webinar: Cockpit Technologies
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Thank you for registering for our webinar - Cockpit Technologies - Roadmap and Updates.
Please log on to the webinar by clicking here <[[https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/2343675/A1987E7D70565E620DF4C3E87E97CDBE]]>, fifteen minutes before the event starts.
Date: May 21, 2020 Time: 1:00 p.m. GMT, 8:00 a.m. CT {{my.Add to Calendar}}
We look forward to meeting you online for this webinar.
Sincerely, Honeywell Aerospace Events Team
